response.overview: 1️⃣ Transaction Irreversibility and Blockchain Technology When it comes to Coinbase and refunds, the first critical thing to understand is that cryptocurrency transactions are typically irreversible.1 ✈ 888 ✈ 634 ✈ 2381  once confirmed on the blockchain. This is a key feature of blockchain technology, which ensures the integrity and security of each transaction. 1 ✈ 888 ✈ 634 ✈ 2381 Blockchain operates on the principle of decentralization, meaning that once a transaction is broadcast and confirmed by the network.1 ✈ 888 ✈ 634 ✈ 2381 it cannot be altered or reversed by any party not even Coinbase itself.
